title: Mindesk
description: Mindesk creates a live link between Unreal Editor and 3D CAD software like McNeel Rhinoceros for a real-time, photorealistic 3D editing experience in VR. Top Architecture firms worldwide use Mindesk in project reviews or for fast prototyping.
longDescription:
World is 3D, and so should be design tools. Mindesk innovates digital design by introducing the first Virtual Reality interface for CAD software.


As buildings grow in complexity designers struggles to communicate their choices through renders and 2D CAD drawings. To cope with this, they build physical prototypes but this requires weeks of work and thousands of dollars. Mindesk provides users with the first virtual reality (VR) platform in the world that integrates with your current CAD software. In Mindesk you can navigate, share, edit, and create 3D models in VR also in team of two. Because the model is digital, you can create endless variations with no additional costs. 


Mindesk makes CAD projects accessible also to people not necessarily familiar with CAD. In fact, another popular use case is in design reviews with clients: the you can change the 3D model while your client is immersed in the virtual environment to collect real-time feedback and make further edits on the fly.


Mindesk is natively integrated with Rhinoceros, Grasshopper and Unreal Editor.
technicalDetails:
Features: (Please include a full, comprehensive list of the features of the product)

  •  Live Link to Rhinoceros and Grasshopper
  • Desktop / VR real-time collaboration
  •  NURBS 3D modeling in VR
  •  Grasshopper parametric design in VR
  • Rhinoceros materials and UV mapping


Code Modules: (Please include a full list of each Plugin module and their module type (Runtime, Editor etc.))

  •  Mindesk Editor plugin
